languages.text: {n}Увы, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированное{/g} лицо выражает скудный спектр эмоций, а синтезированный голос слишком легко прячет ложь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Увы, аугментированное лицо выражает скудный спектр эмоций, а синтезированный голос слишком легко прячет ложь.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}аугментированное{/g} лицо выражает скудный спектр эмоций, а синтезированный голос слишком легко прячет ложь.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Unfortunately, her augmented face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesized voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}
{n}Unfortunately, her augmented face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesized voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}
{n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

{n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

languages.text: {n}残念ながら、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強{/g}措置を受けたトリアーナの顔では感情表現は限られたものとなり、合成音声はいとも簡単に嘘をついてみせる。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}残念ながら、{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}増強{/g}措置を受けたトリアーナの顔では感情表現は限られたものとなり、合成音声はいとも簡単に嘘をついてみせる。{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，她布满{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的脸上只能表达极其有限的情感，她的合成声音也很容易掩盖谎言。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，她布满{g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}植入物{/g}的脸上只能表达极其有限的情感，她的合成声音也很容易掩盖谎言。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, su rostro {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g} expresa una variedad limitada de emociones y su voz artificial maquilla las mentiras sin esfuerzo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, su rostro {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}aumentado{/g} expresa una variedad limitada de emociones y su voz artificial maquilla las mentiras sin esfuerzo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malheureusement, son visage {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g} n'exprime que très peu d'émotions, et si mensonge il y a, sa voix synthétique vous empêche de le déceler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malheureusement, son visage {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmenté{/g} n'exprime que très peu d'émotions, et si mensonge il y a, sa voix synthétique vous empêche de le déceler.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leider zeigt ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentiertes{/g} Gesicht nur wenige Emotionen, und ihre künstliche Stimme verbirgt Lügen zu einfach.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Unfortunately, her {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmented{/g} face expresses a limited range of emotions, and her synthesised voice conceals lies too easily.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leider zeigt ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}augmentiertes{/g} Gesicht nur wenige Emotionen, und ihre künstliche Stimme verbirgt Lügen zu einfach.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki Toriana'nın {g|Encyclopedia:Augmentation}ogment{/g}li yüzündeki ifadelerin dışavurabildiği duygular epey kısıtlı, sentezli sesi de yalanları kolaylıkla saklayabiliyor.{/n}
